forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 1C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 34F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
